title: Swinburne University League of Legends
body:
Greetings Swinburne Summoners! In particular, Swinburne Hawthorn, Victoria. For the future UniLoL events to come!

I was wondering if anyone would like to form a team, I am unsure if a club is already organising this, but in the case where nothing is moving forward, I would like to reach out to players in the university to join together and create a team, for fun and for glory.

If this is posted in th incorrect place, I apologise, if there is any issue, or you wish to speak to me, contact me through game, or leave a method of communication within this post.

Thanks,

Alexander (SirKillerfate) Blatchford

replies.body: Id be interested but Im simply in bronze. Happy to be coached though if anyone is willing to help me out!
I'd join but I'm only silver and I'm at the Croydon campus :/

For anyone looking to meet up with me personally, I'm generally in the Library (LB) each Friday from 12:30 through till 5:30 or later. I'll be a guy wearing glasses, just ask any of us, or stand behind me for a minute if you're shy. people with glasses aren't evil, at least most of them.

Looking forward to seeing you hopefully soon.
